transcript.text: I could ask you the likelihood of this
escalating to our words Another World
War I would just say it is likely when
the Secretary General NATO says all
options are on the table we're in a case
where somebody who's supposed to have a
functioning brain and to know something
about uh nuclear weapons is saying one
of the possibilities is that we'll
decide to destroy the world he's saying
if it turns out that Russia is planning
to use chemical weapons then everything
changes and all options are open all
options means we all get destroyed
